title: Undeserved low-priority queue games!
body:
So, I've recently had a problem with bugsplats and fails to repair the game, ultimately resulting in my AFK for that match, none of it intentional. As a result, I've gotten 5 low-priority queue games, each forcing me to wait 20 minutes!

I hope you remove this, I don't see what I did to deserve this.

replies.body: you have to leave quite a few games to get 20 mins actually you have to go through 5 and 10 mins punishments first so why did you have those before?

*Timethief49* is correct, you'll never receive a 5-game LPQ for a single disconnection, as it takes a trend of disconnections to occur before you see this specific penalty. Regardless of your intent, your absence from the match affects **everyone** in it. This is a big reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and it's a reason we're unable to modify penalties related to the [**Leaverbuster System.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

If you experience further issues and require my assistance, let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qai9ABM2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-30T00:31:13.230+0000)
>
> *Timethief49* is correct, you'll never receive a 5-game LPQ for a single disconnection, as it takes a trend of disconnections to occur before you see this specific penalty. Regardless of your intent, your absence from the match affects **everyone** in it. This is a big reason why the system treats all disconnections equally and it's a reason we're unable to modify penalties related to the [**Leaverbuster System.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)
> 
> If you experience further issues and require my assistance, let me know.

It's not even the problem with Leaverbuster, it's the problem that you're not confronting a problem that I've seen so many people have, Riot is probably the most lazy company I've ever seen.

Bugsplats are certainly a nasty issue. They're typically caused by problems with your system drivers or hardware, so working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) may assist you in resolving this, as it covers the most common solutions.

If you encounter further Bugsplats after taking those steps, let me know, so we can continue troubleshooting.

My question is if you have a bugsplat, are you accountable for lost LP? It only happens very rarely, (my drivers are all up to date with nvidea and my hardware is all 2-3 years old, so farily new) it can almost certainly take 5-10 minutes to rejoin, and even though its not impossible to come back from that, its more than likely. If I lose because of a game issue that isn't my fault, why should I lose LP?
Why do you think I've had them before, hmm, I don't know, maybe because of this problem that was brought upon me by Riot's garbage client.
